title: Comments apreciated (Type in progress)
content:
Hello everyone...I would like to hear your comments about this examples, about a type face i m working on. Particularly I have some troubles in taking desitions about the endigns of -y's-

Thanks

L.

author: Leonardo

comments.content:
Can we see v, w, x and k too?

Cheers!

Hellou D.Berlow... i ve just posted a screen shot with the letters you wanted to see... waiting for your comments :D

Thankyou!

L.

You'd do better posting this in the Serif section of the 'Critique' forum. Very nice BTW, although the leg of the k looks a little weak.

Nick Cooke

I think the top of the k is a bit strong for the bottom. But maybe this does belong in the Crit section. . .

Cheers!
